channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 20:10 plout alarm to Poltava region. Since further reports.
item.description: 游릭 20:10 plout alarm to Poltava region. Since further reports.#Poltava_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 游리 19:50 pm alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapets Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
